meanings.definition: Relating to the interaction between psychological and biological processes.
meanings.sent1: The psychobiologic approach considers how our thoughts affect our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use psychobiologic methods to explore the connection between the mind and the body.
meanings.sent3: It's fascinating how psychobiologic factors can influence our overall well-being.
meanings.sent4: The psychobiologic link between stress and physical health is undeniable.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the psychobiologic aspects of anxiety can lead to better treatment strategies.

meanings.definition: Involving the study of the relationship between behavior and biology.
meanings.sent1: The psychobiologic research project aims to uncover how behavior is linked to biology.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use psychobiologic principles to investigate the impact of genetics on behavior.
meanings.sent3: The psychobiologic perspective adds depth to our understanding of human actions.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the psychobiologic connection between diet and behavior reveals interesting findings.
meanings.sent5: Studying the psychobiologic aspects of addiction sheds light on its complexities.
